import React from 'react' import './Home.css' import lottie from 'lottie-web'; import Navbar from '../../Components/Navbar/Navbar'; const Home = () => { const animation = lottie.loadAnimation({ container: document.getElementById('lottie-animation'), // Specify the container element renderer: 'svg', // Choose the renderer (svg or canvas) loop: true, // Set loop to true if you want the animation to loop autoplay: true, // Set autoplay to true if you want the animation to start playing automatically path: '../../images/mainpageanimation.json' // Specify the path to your JSON animation file }); return (

The super fast book finder!

Find any book you're looking for or join our community of avid readers.

) } export default Home
